text: Geneviève Waïte (February 13, 1948 – May 18, 2019) was a South African actress, singer and model. She was known for her roles as the lead character in Joanna (1978) and as The Girl in Move (1970). Waïte died on May 18, 2019 at the age of 71.Actress Geneviève Waïte, Former Wife of Musician John Phillips, Dead at 71 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:South African actors Category:South African singers Category:South African models Category:People from Cape Town
title: Geneviève Waïte
